Mahārattha：1．Mahārattha． A country where Mahādhammarakkhita went after the Third Council．It is generally identified with the country of the Marāthī at the source of the Godāvarī．Mhv．xii．5，37； Dpv．viii．8； Sp．i．64，67．

2．Mahārattha． A district in Ceylon，near Kālavāpi，to the east．It held the village of Pillavatthi．Cv．lxxii．141，163，190，199； also Cv．Trs．i．333，n．3．
